description:
There is the need for a documentation/guideline of the required steps to develop a new v3 API.

The report of this bug was suggested in this thread: http://lists.openstack.org/pipermail/openstack-dev/2014-November/050711.html
title: Lack of documentation to develop v3 API

comments.content:
There is the need for a documentation/guideline of the required steps to develop a new v3 API.

The report of this bug was suggested in this thread: http://lists.openstack.org/pipermail/openstack-dev/2014-November/050711.html
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~pasquale-porreca
